description: Try our easy to follow Mediterranean Artichoke Pizza recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Vegetable pizza,Pescatarian,Roast,Seafood free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Mediterranean Artichoke Pizza Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Set dough on side to air for a minimum of 1 hour. Once risen, roll out dough to packets recommended size.
Spread tomato sauce evenly over the pizza base. Top with artichokes, roasted peppers, spring onion and fresh basil.
Cover with mozzarella and goat cheese and place on baking tray.
Cook at 200Â°C until golden, 15-20 minutes depending on oven.
